name: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics
description: When Chevreuse, who has this card equipped, is in play, and after opposing characters take Overloaded reaction DMG: Your next 2 instances of Pyro DMG or Electro DMG dealt +1. (Including Pyro DMG or Electro DMG dealt through Swirl reactions)
